sentences.en: As young performers, we bespeak your indulgence.
sentences.cn: 我们都是年轻演员, 我们请求您的包函.

sentences.en: Believest thou? Then let thine activities bespeak that thou wouldst have, in spirit, in truth.
sentences.cn: 你信 吗 ?那么让你的行为在灵性中 、 在真理里,讲出你的所信.

sentences.en: He raised his head to bespeak his son's wish.
sentences.cn: 他抬头问他儿子的愿望.

sentences.en: He sent her to bespeak his girl friend.
sentences.cn: 他委托她跟他的女友谈话.

sentences.en: His polite manners bespeak him ( to be ) a gentleman.
sentences.cn: 他礼貌的举止显示他是一位绅士.

sentences.en: His polite manners bespeak the gentleman.
sentences.cn: 他的彬彬有礼的态度显示出他是个绅士.

sentences.en: I come here to bespeak Fanny a seal.
sentences.cn: 我上这儿来为范妮定刻一枚图章.

sentences.en: She raised her head to bespeak her son's wishes.
sentences.cn: 她抬头问她儿子的愿望.

sentences.en: This predisposition may bespeak a different mentality.
sentences.cn: 这种偏爱可能说明不同的心智状态.

sentences.en: Today's events bespeak a bright future.
sentences.cn: 今天的事件预示着一个美好的未来。

sentences.en: You need't bespeak contempt, Linton : anybody will have It'spontaneously at your service.
sentences.cn: 你用不着要求蔑视, 林敦: 你随时都可以叫任何人自然而然地瞧不起你.

trans.tran_cn: 预定，订（货），证明，预先请求
